title: Adult Neurology Clinic
tagline: Specialized care for brain and nervous system health.
overview: Comprehensive diagnosis and management of neurological disorders including stroke, epilepsy and headaches.
detailedDescription: Our Adult Neurology Clinic provides evidence-based evaluation and long-term management for disorders of the brain, spinal cord and peripheral nerves. We combine advanced diagnostics with personalised care plans to improve function and quality of life.

doctors.name: Dr. Silvanus Wabwire
doctors.title: Consultant Neurologist
doctors.bio: Consultant neurologist with extensive experience in stroke care, seizure management and neurorehabilitation.

testimonials.name: Joseph K.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The neurology team explained my condition clearly and supported my rehabilitation every step of the way.

title: Breast Clinic
tagline: Early detection with multidisciplinary support.
overview: Screening, diagnostic imaging and specialist management for breast disease.
detailedDescription: Our multidisciplinary Breast Clinic provides mammography, ultrasound, biopsy services and personalised treatment planning. We prioritise early detection, timely diagnosis and compassionate patient support.

doctors.name: Dr. Eric Hungu
doctors.title: Breast Surgeon
doctors.bio: Specialist in breast surgery and multidisciplinary cancer care with emphasis on early intervention.

testimonials.name: Lucy K.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: Professional and caring team — my screening and follow-up were handled with dignity.

title: Cardiology Clinic
tagline: Expert heart care with modern diagnostics.
overview: Diagnosis and management of cardiovascular disease including heart failure, arrhythmia and ischemic heart disease.
detailedDescription: Our Cardiology team combines advanced diagnostic testing — ECG, echocardiography and stress testing — with evidence-based treatments and cardiac rehabilitation to optimise heart health.

doctors.name: Dr. Duncan Kilingo
doctors.title: Consultant Cardiologist
doctors.bio: Renowned cardiologist with experience in interventional and preventive cardiology.

testimonials.name: John M.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The cardiology team gave me a clear plan and helped me return to an active life.

title: Chest Clinic (TB Clinic)
tagline: Focused tuberculosis and respiratory disease care.
overview: Screening, diagnosis and treatment for tuberculosis and chronic respiratory conditions.
detailedDescription: The Chest & TB Clinic provides tuberculosis diagnosis, directly observed therapy (DOT), and comprehensive management of chronic respiratory illnesses with a strong public-health focus.

doctors.name: Nursing Team
doctors.title: Chest Clinic Nurses
doctors.bio: Dedicated nursing team providing daily TB care and follow-up.

testimonials.name: Peter N.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The TB programme provided compassionate care and clear instructions for treatment adherence.

title: Dermatology Clinic
tagline: Expert care for skin, hair and nails.
overview: Comprehensive management of dermatologic conditions and cosmetic dermatology services.
detailedDescription: Our Dermatology Clinic treats inflammatory, infectious and neoplastic skin conditions. We provide medical and procedural options including topical therapies, phototherapy and minor office procedures.

doctors.name: Dr. Bernard Gichina
doctors.title: Consultant Dermatologist
doctors.bio: Experienced dermatologist offering both medical and procedural skin care services.

testimonials.name: Njeri W.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: My skin condition improved significantly after the clinic's treatment plan.

title: Endocrinology Clinic
tagline: Specialists in hormonal health and metabolism.
overview: Diagnosis and management of thyroid, adrenal, pituitary and metabolic disorders.
detailedDescription: Our Endocrinology Clinic offers precise hormonal assessment and long-term management plans for endocrine disorders. Services include biochemical testing, imaging liaison and personalised therapy.

doctors.name: Dr. Christopher Kahuho
doctors.title: Consultant Endocrinologist
doctors.bio: Endocrinologist experienced in thyroid, pituitary and metabolic disorders with patient-centred care.

testimonials.name: Anne R.
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The endocrinology team gave clear explanations and a plan that improved my energy and labs.

title: ENT Clinic
tagline: Comprehensive ENT assessment and surgical care.
overview: Diagnosis and treatment for ear, nose and throat conditions including hearing loss and sinus disease.
detailedDescription: Our ENT service provides medical and surgical care for adult and paediatric ENT problems, including audiology, endoscopic sinus procedures and voice clinic services.

doctors.title: ENT Surgeon
doctors.bio: Provides surgical and non-surgical ENT care with emphasis on functional and audiological outcomes.

title: Fertility Clinic
tagline: Confidential, evidence-based fertility care.
overview: Assessment and management for couples experiencing infertility, with modern diagnostic and treatment options.
detailedDescription: Our Fertility Clinic provides comprehensive evaluation, ovulation induction, assisted reproductive techniques and counselling. Care is personalised with privacy and support throughout the journey.

tagline: Comprehensive digestive and liver care.

overview: Diagnosis and treatment of corneal disease including keratoconus, infections and transplant aftercare.
